# Government Tender Announcement
## Hepatitis C Specialist (Expires)

The Correctional Services Canada is seeking proposals for a Hepatitis C Specialist to provide services in the Ontario region.

### Request for Proposal Details

| Criteria | Details |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | 21401-29-4694975 |
| Reference Number | cb-786-29445701 |
| Publication Date | 2024-05-15 |

| Expected Contract Start Date | 2024-08-01 |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2027-07-31 |
| Tender Status | Expired |

### Service Description

The selected Hepatitis C Specialist will provide expert services to the Ontario Region, focusing on:

- Offender consultation for unusual circumstances or therapy-related problems
- Close collaboration with institutional health care teams and offenders
- Training sessions on Hepatitis C virus infections and treatments for staff and offenders, as determined by the Regional Manager of Public Health Ontario.

### Proposal Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Tender Evaluation Method

This tender will be evaluated using a competitive-open bidding process.
